name: Crawl & Fly
description:
There is no audio. Sorry. This was suppose to be a 3 hour project, and ended up being like 6.5.

As a butterfly, you can't land or crash into walls.

As a caterpillar, you can't jump, fly, or do anything but crawl.

Press SHIFT to switch between caterpillar and butterfly.

Use A and D or ARROW KEYS to move left and right.

SPACE bar to flap butterfly wings to fly (tap tap tap tap).

Last as long as you can. The level will move faster the longer you play.
